Package mdlc

Class Coordinate

  • java.lang.Object
    • mdlc.Coordinate
  • class Coordinate
extends java.lang.Object
    Defines the position of each cell in a maze as a coordinate consisting of a row and a column

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      protected int col
      Defines the column of the coordinate
      protected int row
      Defines the row of the coordinate

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Coordinate​(int r, int c)
      Constructor to initialize the object with a given row and column
      Coordinate​(Coordinate c)
      Copy-constructor to initialize the object with another coordinate object

    • Method Summary

      Determines whether or not a given coordinate is adjacent to the coordinate representing the current object
      Coordinate[] moveTo​(java.lang.String moves)
      Determines the final position after executing a series of moves through the maze

      Generates a string representation of the coordinate object

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Generates a string representation of the coordinate object
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:

      • moveTo

        public Coordinate[] moveTo​(java.lang.String moves)
        Determines the final position after executing a series of moves through the maze
        Parameters:
        moves - A string representing the movement instructions consisting of the 4 directional codes: left, up, right, down
        Returns:
        An array of coordinates representing all positions that will be traversed in course of performing the manoeveur

      • isAdjacent

        public boolean isAdjacent​(Coordinate coord)
        Determines whether or not a given coordinate is adjacent to the coordinate representing the current object
        Parameters:
        coord - The coordinate to check
        Returns:
        A boolean indicating whether the two coordinates are adjacent linearly (horizontally or vertically)
